title: JSON schema for a Plox Action yaml file

name.description:
The name of the action.
E.g.: "template", "copy" or "npm-install-package"

description.description:
A text that briefly describes what the action does.
E.g.: "Installs an npm package"

requirements.description:
A javascript expression used to determine if the requirements for this
action have been met.
E.g.: Some actions might require a git repository or a package.json file.

inputs.description:
A pojo of inputs; values the action can use to change its behavior.
E.g.: The "npm-install-package" action has inputs for "dependencies" and "devDependencies".

Action.description: A Plox Action, the most low level concept from all Plox concepts.

Input.description:
An object describing an input for the Action,
inputs can be used to alter the Actions behaviour.
E.g.: The "npm-install-package" Action has the "dependencies" and "devDependencies".
